C

calcPayment() - Method in class invoice.Invoice
Calculates service charge, GST and total bill of the invoice.

Checks if a database file exists in the database folder db.

Displays the details of the desired reservation.

Prompts the user to enter the contact number of the customer who made the reservation they wish to view.

Displays the status of all tables.
chooseMenuType() - Method in class menu.MenuUI
Prompts user to select the type of menu item when creating one.
clearExpiredUI() - Static method in class reservation.ReservationUI
Clears reservations that have expired for more than 30 minutes.
clearOrder() - Method in class table.Table
Clears the order of the table.
contactNumber - Variable in class reservation.Reservation
Contact number of the customer who made the reservation.

For the Menu and Promo classes to allow the user to create a menu or promotion item.

Creates a menu or promotion object.
create() - Method in class menu.MenuUI
Prompts the user to enter the name, description and price of the menu item to be created.

Prompts the user to enter the name, description and price of the promotion item to be created.

Creates a Menu or Promo object.

Creates a new file at filepath if it does not exist.

Creates a file containing an ArrayList of invoices.

Creates a menu item and saves it in the menu file.
createPromo(String, String, double) - Static method in class promo.PromoController
Creates a promotion item and saves it in the promotion file.
createReservationDatabaseFiles() - Static method in class reservation.ReservationController
Creates a file containing an ArrayList of reservations.
createReservationUI() - Static method in class reservation.ReservationUI
Prompts the user to enter reservation details to make a new reservation.
createTableDatabaseFiles() - Static method in class table.TableController
Creates 10 size 2 tables, 10 size 4 tables, 5 size 8 tables and 5 size 10 tables in an ArrayList and saves them in a file.
